data.title: Great place for dinner/lunch
data.text: Nice restaurant, friendly and attentive staff and good food all in one. Nice outdoor area and bar areas.

data.title: Great
data.text: I ordered room service from the Flint.  Who knew that a BLT could be so great.  I will probably hit them up for another one before I leave.  Lol

data.title: Amazing food and great service
data.text: Excellent place to enjoy dinner or breakfast. Our waitress Happy was fantastic and well versed in the menu as well as making great recommendations.  She recommended the spinach pear salad and it was soo good! Great place with a casual atmosphere and good menu.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
JO H.,

Thank you for your great review. I really appreciate you taking the time to tell us about your experience at FLINT. I'm glad Happy recommended the Spinach and Pear Salad – it's a great addition to our menu. Please come dine with us again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice atmosphere but expensive drinks
data.text: The outdoor bar area is lovely and there are heaters if needed. The service was very slow and not what you would expect for a $15.00 drink. It did appear that the bartenders inside were more attentive. It could be due to new staff but unfortunately it didn't make me want to return.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Angela C.,

Thank you for your review regarding your experience at FLINT. I am happy to know that you enjoyed our ambiance and your cocktails. Our patio is great, especially this time of year with the heaters we have. We appreciate your feedback and are always looking to improve. Please come see us again soon. 

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: President
data.text: After a long day we just wanted something light. The menu was accommodating and the service was excellent. Thank you, Destini Ewing for setting a relaxed pace with your professional demeanor.

data.title: Nice but pricey
data.text:
Went with family and friends. The food was good. I thought a little pricey for what you get. 
They had live music. It was fun!
Weather permitting they entertain outside on a patio. Nice environment and facilities. 
I think it you wanted to take someone out for a brunch date this would be a good choice.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, Restaurant Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Twnsis58,

Thanks for reviewing your dining experience at FLINT. It's great to hear that you had a good time with us. We love entertaining on our patio – we always have talented musicians performing. We really appreciate your feedback. Come see us again soon.

Thank you,
Mario Rivera
Restaurant Manager
FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Solid 3.5
data.text:
I've eaten Brunch & Dinner, as well as just drinks at the bar.

The atmosphere is really cool. Kind of a modern rustic feel. The fireplaces are really nice during the winter time. The back patio is also really cool, although I found it odd that it was always empty of patrons when I visited or drove by. 

The service for my dinner experience was good, but Brunch was pretty sub par. We did have a bigger party but it was slow and the waitress was very attentive overall. 

I would rate their cocktails a 5. They were great. The food is average to good, but a bit overpriced. Dinner was better than brunch though. I gave Flint a 3 star instead of 4 star for that fact.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Sean T.,

Thank you for your honest review of FLINT. I really appreciate your business. We are in the midst of a few changes at FLINT, like we just hired a new chef! We are really excited about our changes and hope that you can come dine with us again in a few weeks to check us out again. Also, we just got cornhole on our Patio. Since we do have such great cocktails, you and some friends should come hang out on a Friday night and enjoy a game or two. See you soon!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not as good as the last visit
data.text: Frankly, we were disappointed this visit. The server was well-intentioned and polite but not very knowledgable.  My Caesar salad was very small and tasted nothing like a Caesar; no garlic, tiny bits of iceberg lettuce; and missing the Parmesan crisp and the crostini that were listed on the menu.  And this was a consistent problem: the menu described specific ingredients but they were missing from the dishes as served.  I ordered the lamb chops, which were delicious, but the menu described the dish this way: "Brown Sugar-Seared Colorado Lamb Chop, Grand Marnier, Israeli Couscous, Shaved Brussels Sprouts, Broccolini, Sun-Dried Tomatoes" but there were no Brussel sprouts at all and only tiny bits of broccoli and tomatoes mixed in with a huge quantity of couscous.  I objected and they brought a side of Brussel sprouts, but they were swimming in butter.  My husband's hanger steak was good but very rare, as were my lamb chops, even though we ordered them medium rare and medium, respectively.  The wine list is nice but it seems to take a long time to get the wine, well into our salads before it arrived.  The bread was ok but tasted of reheating.  As others have mentioned, the restaurant is often mostly empty, but we were there on a Saturday night when every room in and around the city was booked,and yet there were only a few tables with guests at 8:00.  Given the prices and the very mixed food and service, I can see why.  We enjoyed the quiet, and our meats and wine were delicious, but with so many downsides and high prices, I think we'll try another place next time.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
X-NYr,

Thank you for reviewing your time at FLINT. It is unfortunate to hear that you had these troubles at our restaurant. I apologize that your experience was not what you expected it to be and definitely not at the level that we know we can operate at. However, I do appreciate all feedback and appreciate you taking the time to review your evening with us. I do hope that you told a manager about your experience and we were able to adjust the problem.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Inefficient service
data.text: Went to dinner with 7 other ppl. Restaurant was at 60% capacity.  Didn't have any apps,  only entrees and drinks.  Started at 730p until 1030p. Waiter couldn't remember the specials,  drinks took 15-20 min each instead of several at a time.  The food arrived 1.5 hrs after ordering.  Then graciously due to numbers,  helped himself to 18% gratuity! The buffalo pot roast and hangar steak was delicious,  after it came. Made a birthday celebration very lengthy.  Possibly not returning.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Faison8,

Thank you for your review. I am sorry to hear that you were not completely satisfied with your time at FLINT. We will pass this review onto our managing staff to see how we could've been better. We will look into our reservation system to find your server and see your table's timeframe. Once again, thank you for your feedback.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overall Quality Dining Experience
data.text: The food and service is excellent at the Flint. The pancakes are superb with the real vanilla flavor. Brunch is something to look forward to at the Flint. One great perk is valet parking. I even parked at the Flint once and went to see a concert down the street and they sent a car to pick me up when the concert was over...That's top notch service for any restaurant.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Med50,

Thank you for dining with us. I am happy to know that you have enjoyed your time with us several times. I am also happy to hear that you have taken advantage of our 90 minute free valet parking. Come see us again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hidden gem!
data.text: We love Flint!  My husband raves about their Seabass. The only problem is if you happen to go on a concert or ballgame night, they have a limited menu. He tried the bison, and it was excellent. The sommelier helped us pick an excellent wine at a very good price point. Since we had failed to make reservations ahead of time, we were lucky to sit outside on the patio. But it was so fun people watching! Every meal we have had at Flint has been superb. Try it out next time you're in Bricktown!

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
FyneWyne,

Thank you for your review! I am so happy to know that you enjoyed your time at FLINT. Even though we have a limited menu on Thunder game days or for big concerts in town, it's a limited menu that is a combination of diner favorites – still delicious like you said. Thank you for dining with us. Come see us again soon. 

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not really impressed
data.text: The food was ok, I ordered the daily special, it was curry shrimp and my spouse ordered the filet. The filet was less than impressive and the curry shrimp was pretty good. Service was disappointing. Never really felt like I was our servers priority. She seemed surprised that we needed more water and drinks.  Overall I am fairly certain I will not return..

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Jay P.,

Thank you for reviewing your time at FLINT. I am sorry to hear that you did not enjoy your time with us. Just so you know, all of our guests are a priority to us. Please know that this issue will be addressed during our next employee meeting. We appreciate your feedback, and I hope you'll join us again soon. 

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great for any occasion
data.text: Centrally located. Great outdoor seating. Close to many downtown OKC activities so parking once (Flint has valet parking) and walking is safe and easy. Very good breakfast/brunch menu. Dinner delicious.  Cocktails are a plus!

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Tmorton2012,

Thank you for your review of FLINT. I'm so happy to know that you liked so many aspects of our restaurant – location, outdoor seating, good food and great cocktails. Did you know that we serve $1.99 mimosas during weekend brunch? We hope you'll come visit us again soon and try a mimosa!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice repeat visit
data.text: We have been to Flint before, a few years ago, and were pleased to see that the menu remains standout and the service and value are still excellent. Our visit was during a significant construction upgrade, so the ambience was lacking. However, the ambient music played was mostly mid to late 1990s hits, can’t say much wrong anyplace that plays Dave Matthews Band! Anyway, the menu choices are excellent; the lamb chops (3) were cooked perfectly, and the Israeli couscous was a nice addition, not dry but fresh and slightly earthy. The bison pot roast with root vegetables was perhaps a bit too hearty for early September and 90 degrees outside, but the slight gaminess of the bison translated well and enhanced the veggies. Portion size was very good, maybe too much couscous. Service was good, not hovering.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
JoMKess,

Thank you for your review of FLINT. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed your time with us and that our quality of service, food and ambiance hasn't changed. I hope you'll come visit us again soon. We appreciate you!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relief from corporate restaurants!
data.text: Visiting OKC and friends who used to work at the Colcord suggested FLINT for dinner. I was not disappointed. I am a very picky diner and as a business traveler I am so done with the big chain restaurants that try to pass as fine dining. FLINT was a treat, the appetizers were fantastic, the Bison pot roast was incredible. The staff was unobtrusive but polite and friendly. Valet parking and a great interior finish the list. See you next time FLINT!

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hi Stan,

Thank you for reviewing your time at FLINT – what a kind review. Your friends made a great suggestion, and I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us.
Please come visit us again next time you're in town.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Turkey French Dip
data.text: Had a business lunch today. It was a rainy day and the restaurant was very cool and comfortable. I sat next to the fire. I thought it would be too hot, but it was very comfortable.  I ordered the salmon soup. Wasn't very impressed as it was very salty. The turkey French dip was awesome. It was nice that they put the mayo on the side as it didn't need it. My guests ordered the Cobb salad with salmon and enjoyed it. Very professional waitstaff. Will return.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
CarogaMan,

Thank you for your kind and efficient review. I am happy to know that you and your guest had a nice lunch at FLINT. We hope to see you again soon.

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent!
data.text: The food was really, really good. Had the hangar steak special with the seared scallops, broccolini, and Mac and cheese. All very good. The service was not excellent but that happens sometimes and one person can't always be a reflection of the other servers there, plus maybe it was a bad day for them. Definitely would recommend and will go back.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Brooks R.,

Thank you for your review and for believing that we can be better than the service you received. We are always striving to improve, and I'm glad to hear that you will be back. I am also happy to hear that you enjoyed your food. See you soon!

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A Place to Go--Downtown
data.text: The atmosphere here is very classy and great for a couple's date night. My husband and I didn't have dinner but just wine and salads. My pear spinach salad was yummy and the portion was generous. My husband has equal sentiments regarding his salad as well. We have tried to eat here earlier, but it is often busy with downtown events happening at Chesapeake or Cox Center. I would say the prices are $$$ rather than two as suggested by some. The menu did not really appeal to me but my food was quite pleasing. Reservations are available and the staff was quite friendly. Parking is limited.

owner_response.author: FLINT_Manager, General Manager at Flint, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Larren C.,

Thank you for reviewing your time at FLINT. I am happy to know that you found your salad to be good. Next time you have trouble parking, please use our complimentary valet parking for up to 90 minutes. Once again, thank you for your review. 

Kind Regards,
Blane Thompson
General Manager
Colcord Hotel / FLINT
owner_response.title: Owner Response
